case.name: Identifying name (ex. Must Strip (Self))
case.description: Lucy summons her celestial spirit Virgo from the celestial spirit realm.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Stripping)
case.description: Lucy attempts to cheat by having her celestial spirit Virgo bring her extra clothes from the celestial spirit realm.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. After Stripping)
case.description: Lucy's skirt falls down when she removes her belt.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. After Stripping)
case.description: Lucy's attempt to cheat backfires and Virgo removes her skirt instead of bringing more clothes.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Must Masturbate (Self, first to do so))
case.description: Lucy's celestial spirit Loke (also known as Leo) arrives unbidden to "help" (perv on) her.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Start Masturbating (Self))
case.description: Lucy forces Loke to return to the celestial spirit realm for perving on her with a forced gate closure and a punch.
